title: The Favorites - NFL Week 16 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 16 Gambling Preview
description:
If betting on the NFL games during the holidays gives you the jingle tingles, this is the most magical time of the year! Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of the Action Network dive into the full slate, including a Christmas Day game between the Colts and Cardinals, as well as Thursday Night Football and Monday Night Football. Together they select their early picks amid more COVID madness, and narrow their sights on the best opportunities on the betting board.

SF TEN - 13 MIN

CLE GB - 15 MIN

IND AZ - 19 MIN

DET ATL - 25 MIN

TB CAR - 27 MIN

NYJ JAX - 29 MIN

NYG PHL - 32 MIN

LAC HOU - 33 MIN

BUF NE - 34 MIN

LAR MIN - 41 MIN

BAL CIN - 43 MIN

CHI SEA - 45 MIN

DEN LV - 45 MIN

PIT KC - 46 MIN

WFT DAL - 48 MIN

MIA NO - 49 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
